trans-unit.source: Serves as the root container for state machine workflows.
trans-unit.target: Fungerar som Rotbehållare för tillstånd datorn arbetsflöden.

trans-unit.source: Contains event-driven activities and states.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller händelsedriven aktiviteter och tillstånd.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The StateMachineWorkflowActivity is an activity container used to create workflows that follow a state machine model.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]StateMachineWorkflowActivity är en behållare för aktiviteten som används för att skapa arbetsflöden som följer en tillstånd datorn modell.

trans-unit.source: The StateMachineWorkflowActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the StateMachineWorkflowActivity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: StateMachineWorkflowActivity är en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, vilket innebär att StateMachineWorkflowActivity kan innehålla andra aktiviteter.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateMachineWorkflowActivity and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities are the only permitted child activities of the StateMachineWorkflowActivity.
trans-unit.target: StateMachineWorkflowActivity och <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>aktiviteter är de enda tillåtna underordnade aktiviteter av StateMachineWorkflowActivity.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities are permitted because the root activity itself behaves like a state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>aktiviteter tillåts eftersom rotaktiviteten själva fungerar som ett tillstånd.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you can have <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities at the root level that are used by all the State activities in the StateMachineWorkflowActivity.
trans-unit.target: Du kan därför ha <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>aktiviteter på rotnivå som används av alla tillstånd aktiviteter i StateMachineWorkflowActivity.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities at this level provide a global mechanism for processing workflow events and automate state transitions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>aktiviteter på den här nivån globala mekanism för att bearbeta händelser för arbetsflöde och automatisera tillståndsövergångar.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activities provide a mechanism to define the various stages in the model.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>aktiviteter som tillhandahåller en mekanism för att definiera de olika stegen i modellen.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateMachineWorkflowActivity has properties that are required for the execution of the state machine workflow.
trans-unit.target: StateMachineWorkflowActivity har egenskaper som krävs för körning av arbetsflödet tillstånd datorn.

trans-unit.source: Most notably, the StateMachineWorkflowActivity has two properties that are important: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>.
trans-unit.target: Framför allt StateMachineWorkflowActivity har två egenskaper som är viktiga: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>och <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> of the state machine is the state in which the state machine is when an instance of the state machine is created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>för tillståndsdatorn är tillståndet tillståndsdatorn är när en instans av tillståndsdatorn har skapats.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> property is mandatory and must be provided when a StateMachineWorkflowActivity is created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>egenskapen är obligatorisk och måste anges när en StateMachineWorkflowActivity har skapats.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> of the state machine is like any other state activity that is contained within the state machine.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>tillståndsdatorn är precis som andra tillstånd aktivitet som ingår i tillståndsdatorn.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: The state activity can be a direct child of the StateMachineWorkflowActivity root activity and a StateMachineWorkflowActivity can have only one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>.
trans-unit.target: Aktiviteten tillstånd kan vara en direkt underordnade för rotaktiviteten StateMachineWorkflowActivity och en StateMachineWorkflowActivity kan bara ha en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty> of the StateMachineWorkflowActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activity that is designated as the end state of the StateMachineWorkflowActivity.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>StateMachineWorkflowActivity är en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>aktivitet som är utsedd till slutet tillståndet för StateMachineWorkflowActivity.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: When a transition is made to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>, the workflow execution is completed.
trans-unit.target: När en övergång görs till den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>, körningen av arbetsflödet har slutförts.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty> is not mandatory.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>är inte obligatoriskt.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: This means that you can have a StateMachineWorkflowActivity that is not completed.
trans-unit.target: Det innebär att du har en StateMachineWorkflowActivity som inte är slutförda.

trans-unit.source: This does not mean that the state machine workflow is always active in memory.
trans-unit.target: Detta innebär inte att arbetsflödet tillstånd datorn alltid är aktiv i minnet.

trans-unit.source: The StateMachineWorkflowActivity might be unloaded as it waits for an event.
trans-unit.target: StateMachineWorkflowActivity kan inte inaktiveras eftersom det väntar på en händelse.

trans-unit.source: StateMachineWorkflowActivity activities that never complete are especially useful in processing long running business transactions, as in the case of a purchase order received by a supplier.
trans-unit.target: StateMachineWorkflowActivity aktiviteter som Slutför aldrig är särskilt användbara vid bearbetning av långvariga affärstransaktioner som i fallet med en inköpsordern som tagits emot av en leverantör.

trans-unit.source: The fact that the purchase order was fulfilled does not mean that the purchase order process is over.
trans-unit.target: Det faktum att inköpsordern uppfylldes innebär inte att ordning köpet är över.

trans-unit.source: The goods that are part of the purchase order might be returned or the purchase order might be amended and have additional items added to it after the fulfillment.
trans-unit.target: Varor som ingår i inköpsordern kan returneras eller inköpsordern kan ändras och har ytterligare objekt läggas till efter uppfyllelse.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes there might be a requirement to keep the purchase order records for an extended period of time for legal or other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Ibland kan det vara krav på att köpa ordning poster för en längre tid för juridiska eller andra ändamål.

trans-unit.source: The fact that a workflow does not finish just means that the workflow remains in an unloaded state.
trans-unit.target: Det faktum att ett arbetsflöde inte avslutas bara innebär att arbetsflödet fortsätter att vara i tillståndet bort från minnet.

trans-unit.source: There may be a case for retiring the workflows, which means that after a set period of time the workflow instance may be forced to shut down.
trans-unit.target: Det kan finnas fall för att ta bort arbetsflöden, vilket innebär att när en viss tid arbetsflödesinstansen kan tvingas att stänga av.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref> klassen med namnet på aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Användardefinierad namnet på aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger slutet <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> av arbetsflödet.

trans-unit.source: When a transition is made to the CompletedStateName, the workflow execution is completed.
trans-unit.target: När en övergång görs till CompletedStateName har körningen av arbetsflödet slutförts.

trans-unit.source: The CompletedStateName is not mandatory.
trans-unit.target: CompletedStateName är inte obligatoriskt.

trans-unit.source: This means that you can have a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> that is not completed.
trans-unit.target: Det innebär att du har en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>som inte har slutförts.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: This does not mean that the state machine workflow is always active in memory.
trans-unit.target: Detta innebär inte att arbetsflödet tillstånd datorn alltid är aktiv i minnet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> might be unloaded as it waits for an event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>kan tas bort eftersom det väntar på en händelse.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A> and CompletedStateName, see <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A>och CompletedStateName, se <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The end <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Slutet <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> av arbetsflödet.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref> som riktar in sig på <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName*>egenskap.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the currently executing <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar namnet på körs <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CurrentStateName property only returns the name of the current state when accessed from within the workflow, for example, from a code handler in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CurrentStateName returnerar endast namnet på det aktuella tillståndet när nås inifrån arbetsflödet, till exempel från en kodhanterare i en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>aktivitet.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The property does not work from host code because the host only has access to a copy of the workflow definition, and never to the live instance tree.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen fungerar inte från kod värden eftersom värden har bara åtkomst till en kopia av arbetsflödesdefinitionen och aldrig till trädet live instans.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] how to determine the current state from the host, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.CurrentStateName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> class.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]hur du avgör det aktuella tillståndet från värden finns i <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.CurrentStateName%2A>egenskapen för <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance>klassen.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.CurrentStateName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Namnet på aktuellt <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> that determines whether dynamic updates can be made in the workflow, when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger en <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> som avgör om dynamiska uppdateringar kan göras i arbetsflödet, när åsidosätts i en härledd klass.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> that identifies when dynamic updates can be made.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> som identifierar när dynamiska uppdateringar kan göras.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> in which the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> is when an instance of the state machine is created.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> där den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref> är när en instans av tillståndsdatorn skapas.

trans-unit.source: The InitialStateName property is mandatory and must be provided when a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> is created.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen InitialStateName är obligatoriskt och måste anges när en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>har skapats.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: The InitialStateName of the state machine is like any other state activity that is contained within the state machine.
trans-unit.target: InitialStateName för tillståndsdatorn är precis som andra tillstånd aktivitet som ingår i tillståndsdatorn.

trans-unit.source: The state activity can be a direct child of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> root activity and a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> can have only one InitialStateName.
trans-unit.target: Aktiviteten tillstånd kan vara ett underordnat objekt till den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>rot aktivitet och en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>kan ha en enda InitialStateName.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] InitialStateName and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A>, see <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]InitialStateName och <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A>finns <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> in which the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> is when an instance of the state machine is created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> där den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref> är när en instans av tillståndsdatorn skapas.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref> som riktar in sig på <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName*>egenskap.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the previously executed <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar namnet på den tidigare körda <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The PreviousStateName property only returns the name of the previous state when accessed from within the workflow, for example, from a code handler in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen PreviousStateName returnerar endast namnet på det tidigare tillståndet när nås inifrån arbetsflödet, till exempel från en kodhanterare i <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The property does not work from host code because the host only has access to a copy of the workflow definition, never to the live instance tree.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen fungerar inte från kod värden eftersom värden har bara åtkomst till en kopia av arbetsflödesdefinitionen aldrig till trädet live instans.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] how to determine the previous state from the host, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateHistory%2A> property of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> class.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]hur du avgör det tidigare tillståndet från värden finns i <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateHistory%2A>egenskapen för <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance>klassen.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateHistory%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the previous <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Namnet på den tidigare <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref> that is used to change the state of a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Namnet på den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"> </xref> som används för att ändra tillstånd för en <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: Det här fältet är konstant.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.
